reviews.review: Its kinda good ngl

游戏名：第五它爹
网易这个白眼狼，本来就是个抄袭游戏，只是杀机不想和你计较而已，那些傻逼第五小鬼天天说杀机抄袭第五人格，笑死人了，网易还天天大张旗鼓的声讨母牛世界，自己有做好吗，你都可以抄袭别人，别人抄袭你你就不乐意了，而且我的世界也不是网易的原创游戏，一天天的在那里屌什么屌，傻逼网易，第五人格早晚和母牛世界一个下场
They did a pretty good job with this game

legal
gud game
11/10 co-op horror game

I've been playing this game since 2016, took a break for a few years and have come back recently and have been playing on a daily basis again! I've always enjoyed this game as well as being involved in the community, and I've been having a great time trying all of the new killer/survivor content as well as all of their perks.
Dead Bug Daylight lmao

I hate this game, I hate the players but I literally can't stop playing. The community is really toxic and that shines through in the matches but somehow that makes the struggle more fun. Gameplay can be as simple or as complicated as you like and there's still a decent chance you walk away with a few wins. Devs on this project are genuinely lovely and really take feedback into consideration.
dfun
一句话，超爱，跟毒品一样，爱不释手。

I have played this game a lot over the last 6 years (mainly on console) but I love this game. I do feel like not all concerns are heard and addressed equally but I feel like that is with any game. I do appreciate the devs at least changing things up a bit here and there. Not to mention the pretty cool licensed killers that they are able to lock down. Overall I would definitely recommend to anyone!
Not much to say its a fun game and it takes time to get better.
ben?

I use to LOVE this game. I spent tons of money and hours on the game, just like many others. Every time the games gets a LITTLE fun for the killers Behaviour Interactive sh*t all over the game. Not even World of Warcraft balancing is this bad. It is sad they make this game so heavily favored towards survivors. Survivors and killers both should be able to have fun. It is not fun when it's extremely one sided. That's not even mentioning all the hacking and bots they allow. Hopefully they will make killers enjoyable to play again, if not maybe another company will see these reviews and step up to the plate and do what DBD creators can't or won't do.
I'm sure they wont read this, but one can hope.
dont buy this
an amazing game to have fun with friends
Fun game to play solo or with friends.  It's a great time trying to get away from the Killer!

Absolutely garbage meta, more often than not if you get downed. The killer will hook you and camp the hook until you're dead. Making your team entirely ineffective. Maybe playing with friends is more fun, but to me the game is not worth the money even on sale.
I can't escape im trapped HELP

I fucking hate this game with every fiber of my being. I am convinced with every single living cell of my body this game has single-handedly made me a terrible person. empathy, self-control, a moral compass, these things mean nothing to me now. I can't stop playing this game despite this. Send help 10/10
Has some flaws that make competitive play really weird at times but as a game is overall a really fun experience

After sinking so much into this game I'm so done. It's not fun and the only way people justify it is with shitty actions and changes that aren't good for either side. I thought when I started it be fun and the more I played the worse it got. I tried to enjoy it but it drains you of anything good feeling. Like it makes you feel like shit and to act like a shithead to others. Not a healthy mindset in a game. So I wouldn't tell anyone to try this. The appeal of the horror is there and that was always my draw but I can't do this anymore. So there ya go.

친구와 함께 술래잡기를 하자! 물론 술래는 친구들을 죽여도돼!

위에 적은 문구가 가장 잘 어울리는 게임. 처음 시작했을때는 죽어라 무서웠다. 살인마에게 들켜서 죽으면 어떡하지? 갈고리에 걸려서 스페이스바 연타한 기억이 가장 크다. 하지만 꾹 참고 50시간만 즐겨보자. 이렇게 즐거운 놀이터가 따로없다.

이제는 고일대로 고여버린 고인물 게임이지만 아직까지도 술래잡기 형태의 게임 존엄. 꽤 재미있다.

단점은 가장 위에 적은 문구에서 말했듯이 '친구' 가 필요하다는점.
very fun game

Highly recommend this game! This game gets your heart beating so fast and it is extremely addicting. Sometimes my heart beats so fast when I play this game I can't tell if it's the killers heartbeat or my own lol. I love all the different clothing choices for all the characters as well as the sound effects and music. My only complaint is that sometimes this game bugs out and kicks people, and then you have to restart it multiple times to get it working again.

Shit game. I havent played dbd since 2020.I play killer with no perks and I play against 4 tryhards with 1k hrs and 4 flashlights and when I play a game with survivor I get chased by the killer the entire game and die right when all gens are repaired and my teammates leave without me. All 3 of my teammates had under 10 hrs. Nice matchmaking.
play if you want aids
